name: Konradstein 3D
description:
In Konradstein 3D, navigate your way through thin corridors, jump over lava pits, defeat enemies, and challenge your friend to a game of local multiplayer.

Don't have a sharp eye? No problem. Train with the Shooting Range mode in which you shoot down targets that appear in the air, or on the ground. The scores are based on your distance between you and the target.

This game is completely controller friendly, meaning you can navigate the menu, play the game, or exit the game modes, all with a controller.

Local multiplayer differs from the rest of the games, as it is played with player 1 using keyboard and mouse, and player 2 using a controller. 

Have fun!
